description: This file defines the AppRouter class for a Flutter mobile application, providing route names and a static routes map for navigation between different screens. It manages route constants and argument parsing for certain routes.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: Provides named route constants and a static method to access route mappings for a Flutter app.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: A static getter that returns a map of route names to widget builders, handling argument extraction for certain routes.
